snippet: The chairman of the Federal Communications Commission describes its efforts to promote broadband.
abstract: Letter from Federal Communications Commission chairman Julius Genachowski comments on May 8 Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column on need for faster broadband speeds.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Federal Communications Commission describes its efforts to promote broadband.

headline.main: Faster Broadband Speeds: The View From the F.C.C.
headline.print_headline: Faster Broadband Speeds: The View From the F.C.C.
